articles.description: Novak Djokovic continues his bid for a 25th Grand Slam title as he faces Lorenzo Musetti in the Australian Open quarter-finals - follow live text and radio coverage.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026 LIVE: Novak Djokovic vs Lorenzo Musetti - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: All the latest from the January transfer window as Aston Villa close in on re-signing midfielder Douglas Luiz.
articles.title: Transfer window: Luiz set for Villa; where could Mateta go?

articles.description: With the league phase of the Champions League almost over, which teams can join Arsenal and Bayern Munich in the top eight?
articles.title: Champions League: Which clubs can make top eight and qualify for knockouts in league stage final round?

articles.description: Novak Djokovic's bid for more tennis history is still alive as he scrapes into the Australian Open semi-finals as Lorenzo Musetti retires injured at two sets up.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic scrapes into semi-finals as Lorenzo Musetti retires injured when two sets up

articles.description: Newcastle United have only won three away games in all competitions this season and head coach Eddie Howe wants his side to rise to the challenge as they face European champions Paris St-Germain in the Champions League on Wednesday.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain v Newcastle: How can Eddie Howe's side cure travel sickness in Champions League?

articles.description: San Antonio Spurs' Victor Wembanyama says he is "horrified" after two fatal shootings by immigration agents in Minnesota.
articles.title: San Antonio Spurs' Victor Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings

articles.description: European champions PSG face Newcastle in the Champions League on Wednesday - but why have Luis Enrique's side not been at their best so far this term?
articles.title: Paris St-Germain: Why are Champions League holders struggling to hit top form?

articles.description: World number two Nelly Korda says a mixed gender indoor virtual league "would have been revolutionary" following the launch of a women's competition backed by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: Nelly Korda: Lack of mixed indoor league in TGL 'an unbelievable miss' says world number two

articles.description: Travelling Chelsea fans in Naples for Wednesday's Champions League game are told to "exercise extreme caution" after two supporters suffer injuries.
articles.title: Chelsea fans told to use 'extreme caution' in Napoli after pair injured.

articles.description: Six-time major champion Iga Swiatek says the behind-the-scenes cameras at the Australian Open are watching players "like animals in the zoo".
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Iga Swiatek and Jessica Pegula criticise cameras in players' areas at Melbourne Park
